meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>anti</kanji> <kanji>echo</kanji> is still an <vocabulary>echo</vocabulary>! It's just going back and forth with a normal echo. Together they get a weird <vocabulary>reverberation</vocabulary> going.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
